thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Vtr Bio-Tech sees FY 2017 net profit to down 15 pct to 35 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Vtr Bio-Tech sees FY 2017 net profit to down 15 pct to 35 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - guangdong vtr bio-tech co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Guangdong Vtr Bio-Tech Co Ltd :
* Sees net profit for FY 2017 to decrease by 15 percent to 35 percent, compared to net profit of FY 2016 (113.6 million yuan)
* Says decrease in sales income of main product, and increase in production costs as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/PUMLD5
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
